message: Fair and square, let's split it 50/50!
I'll give you a slightly better offer. You can't do much better than this!
Not bad, but I can do better than that!
You're not giving me enough, let's try 60/40!
You're getting closer, but I still think I can do better. This is my best offer so far!
No way, I'm not getting only 40%! I'll keep pushing for more!
You're not getting the better end of this deal, Bob! Time to give me more!
I'm not giving in yet. You're getting closer, but I still think I can do better. Let's see if you can do the same!
You think I'm getting closer, but I'm actually just getting more patient. I'll wait for an even better offer!
Time's running out, Bob! I'm taking a bigger slice of the pie. Your turn to decide!
I'm not giving up yet! I'll give you a slightly better offer, but I'm not going to go easy on you!
You think you're being generous, but I'm not impressed. I'll wait for an even better offer!
This is my last offer, Bob. Take it or leave it! I'm not backing down!
I'm not going to back down either! I'll give you a fair offer, and it's time to end this game!
Not again! I've seen this offer before, and I'm not falling for it. I'll keep pushing for more!
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it, or we'll both walk away with nothing!
I'm not going to accept your offer. I'll take the risk and walk away with nothing rather than accept such an unfair deal!
Ha! You can't be serious, Bob! I'll reject your offer and we'll both walk away with nothing!
